view_description: Provides a consolidated view of shipment statuses and related details from gate-in to gate-out, including compartments, driver, vehicle, and schedule.
sql_query: CREATE VIEW vwGateToGate AS SELECT S.Code AS ShipmentCode, SST.ShipmentStatus, SST.UpdatedTime, SST.ShipmentCompartmentID, SST.ShipmentCompartmentStatus, S.DriverID, S.VehicleID, S.ScheduledDate FROM Shipment_Status_Time SST INNER JOIN Shipment S ON SST.ShipmentID = S.ID

columns.column_description: specifies each shipment status like READY, CHECKED_IN, LOADING, CLOSED etc.
when the shipment status is updated it stores the updated time for each shipment
there are different compartments in the shipment, it stores the id for each compartment
stores the status of each compartment like LOADING, EMPTY, COMPLETED etc
stores the id of the driver for each shipment
stores the vehicle id used for each shipment
specifies when the shipment is scheduled for
